name: Cyber-TP
description:
CYBER-TP

You wake up feeling different. Stronger. You have been altered for one purpose. Destruction.

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

RMB - Teleport

LMB - Shoot

Tab - Toggle Inventory

Guns:

Rifle

Shotgun

Rocket Launcher

Rail Gun

Items:

Health Pack
Bonus Movement Speed
Bonus Armour
Bonus Damage
Bonus Attack Speed


Teleport Modules:

Damage Module: When you teleport, create a line from your starting position and damage every enemy that it makes contact with.

Shield Module: Grants you a temporary shield at the end of your teleportation.

Energy Module: Provides bonus energy regeneration.

This is our entry for the LowRezJam 2021

Audio and SFX

Jack Luxon

Programming

Jordan Robinson

Artwork

Irmandito
